get.description: Gets the systemAssignedIdentity available under the specified RP scope.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource.

schema.description: Describes a system assigned identity resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: The properties associated with the identity.
properties.title: System Assigned Identity properties.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant which the identity belongs to.

principalId.description: The id of the service principal object associated with the created identity.

clientId.description: The id of the app associated with the identity. This is a random generated UUID by MSI.

clientSecretUrl.description: The ManagedServiceIdentity DataPlane URL that can be queried to obtain the identity credentials.

get.description: List the operations for the provider

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.title: Operations List.
schema.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.title: Operations List.
value.description: The Operation items on this page

items.title: Microsoft.ManagedIdentity Operation.
items.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.title: Operation Name.
name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

display.title: Operation Display.
display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.title: Resource Provider Name.
provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

operation.title: Operation Type.
operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

resource.title: Resource Type.
resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

description.title: Operation description
description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

nextLink.title: Next Link
nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the identity resource.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: A skip token is used to continue retrieving items after an operation returns a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skipToken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

name.title: Operation Name.
name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

display.title: Operation Display.
display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.title: Resource Provider Name.
provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

operation.title: Operation Type.
operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

resource.title: Resource Type.
resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

description.title: Operation description
description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

operation.title: Operation Type.
operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

resource.title: Resource Type.
resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

description.title: Operation description
description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

nextLink.title: Next Link
nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SystemAssignedIdentity.description: Describes a system assigned identity resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: The properties associated with the identity.
properties.title: System Assigned Identity properties.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant which the identity belongs to.

principalId.description: The id of the service principal object associated with the created identity.

clientId.description: The id of the app associated with the identity. This is a random generated UUID by MSI.

clientSecretUrl.description: The ManagedServiceIdentity DataPlane URL that can be queried to obtain the identity credentials.

SystemAssignedIdentityProperties.title: System Assigned Identity properties.
SystemAssignedIdentityProperties.description: The properties associated with the system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant which the identity belongs to.

principalId.description: The id of the service principal object associated with the created identity.

clientId.description: The id of the app associated with the identity. This is a random generated UUID by MSI.

clientSecretUrl.description: The ManagedServiceIdentity DataPlane URL that can be queried to obtain the identity credentials.

UserAssignedIdentitiesListResult.description: Values returned by the List operation.

value.description: The Identity items on this page

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: The properties associated with the identity.
properties.title: User Assigned Identity properties.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant which the identity belongs to.

principalId.description: The id of the service principal object associated with the created identity.

clientId.description: The id of the app associated with the identity. This is a random generated UUID by MSI.

isolationScope.description: Enum to configure regional restrictions on identity assignment, as necessary.
